itemDescription: Welsh rugby league and rugby union footballer

wikipedia_page.main: David "Dai" Edwards (21 March 1896 – 24 August 1960) was an international rugby forward who played rugby union for Glynneath and rugby league with Rochdale Hornets. He won a single cap for Wales under the rugby union code and then represented his country at rugby league in two matches between 1923 and 1925.
